---
title: "An interactive map of universities in the UK"
author: "Felix Dijkstal"
date: '2022-11-09'
output: html_document
---

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, fig.align='center'}
library(leaflet)
library(dplyr)

data = read.csv('~/Data Science/Data/uk_universities_locations.csv')

data %>%
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(clusterOptions = markerClusterOptions())
```
